title: Episode 17: Elisa Lam
description:
Bizarre behavior captured by an elevator camera launched this case into the spotlight. What caused Elisa Lam's erratic and paranoid behavior at The Cecil Hotel? Paranormal activity, a game to access another dimension, government testing? Could the dark and tortured history of the hotel and its seedy residents be to blame? Or was it her lifelong battle with mental illness? Years after her body was discovered floating in the water tank on the hotel rooftop there are still more questions than answers.
Support Sinisterhood

itunes:author: Cloud10 and iHeartPodcasts
itunes:subtitle: Bizarre behavior captured by an elevator camera leads to an even more bizarre death.
